tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE match_results (
    match_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    match_date DATE,
    home_team VARCHAR,
    away_team VARCHAR,
    home_score INT,
    away_score INT,
    home_goals INT,
    away_goals INT,
    home_assists INT,
    away_assists INT,
    home_cards INT,
    away_cards INT
)

CREATE TABLE Matches (
  match_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  team1 VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  team2 VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  date DATE,
  score1 INT,
  score2 INT,
  goals1 INT,
  goals2 INT,
  assists1 VARCHAR(50),
  assists2 VARCHAR(50),
  cards1 INT,
  cards2 INT
);

CREATE TABLE Players (
  player_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  player_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  team VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  goals_scored INT,
  assists INT,
  yellow_cards INT,
  red_cards INT
);

CREATE TABLE MatchResults (
    match_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    home_team VARCHAR(255),
    away_team VARCHAR(255),
    match_date DATE,
    match_time TIME,
    home_team_goals INT,
    away_team_goals INT,
    home_team_assists INT,
    away_team_assists INT,
    home_team_cards INT,
    away_team_cards INT
)

CREATE TABLE Players (
    player_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    player_name VARCHAR(255),
    team_id INT,
    position VARCHAR(50),
    goals_scored INT,
    assists INT,
    yellow_cards INT,
    red_cards INT
)

CREATE TABLE Teams (
    team_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    team_name VARCHAR(255),
    city VARCHAR(100),
    stadium_name VARCHAR(255),
    manager_name VARCHAR(255),
    established_year INT
)

CREATE TABLE match_results (
    match_id INT,
    team1_id INT,
    team2_id INT,
    team1_score INT,
    team2_score INT,
    team1_goals INT,
    team2_goals INT,
    team1_assists INT,
    team2_assists INT,
    team1_cards INT,
    team2_cards INT
);

CREATE TABLE match_results (
    match_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    match_date DATE,
    home_team VARCHAR(50),
    away_team VARCHAR(50),
    home_score INT,
    away_score INT,
    goals_scored INT,
    assists INT,
    yellow_cards INT,
    red_cards INT
)

CREATE TABLE teams (
    team_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    team_name VARCHAR(50),
    founded_year INT,
    country VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE players (
    player_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    player_name VARCHAR(50),
    team_id INT,
    position VARCHAR(50),
    date_of_birth DATE
)

CREATE TABLE goals (
    goal_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    match_id INT,
    player_id INT,
    goal_minute INT
)

CREATE TABLE cards (
    card_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    match_id INT,
    player_id INT,
    card_type VARCHAR(10),
    card_minute INT
)
